FileDescription: This file contains parameters previously hard coded in VineLOGIC

RootCho.Description: Root carbohydrate per kg of dry matter

RootDwFrac.Description: Root Dry weight, as a fraction of trunk dry weight

Tbase.Description: Baseline temperature for thermal time calculations

CritWFPS.Description: Critical limit for water filled pore space

Setdd.Description: A thermal time requirement after first flower

maxLAI.Description: An upper limit on Leaf Area Index growth
